name: dat-design
description: design assets and docs for dat project
author: dat project

scripts.build-css: node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-magic-importer --include-path scss scss/base.scss   public/css/base.css  && node-sass --importer node_modules/node-sass-magic-importer --include-path scss scss/styleguide.scss  public/css/styleguide.css
scripts.build-icons: svgo -f icons && spritesh --input icons --output public/svg/sprite.svg --viewbox '0 0 240 240' --prefix daticon-
